Application

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents Vectors in the XY plane. Counts with methods to calculate the XY values of any point on the line of the vector.
    Author:
    Sebastian Andrade and Alexander Bratyshkin
